title: Hitodenashi no Kokoro
sinopse:
Set in the Taisho era, a girl named Kokoro has a very unpleasant skill. She abnormality attracts perverts! Her life since childhood has been filled with ups and downs and at the age of 17 she decided that she couldn't live a normal life due to her condition. But then she unexpectedly meets someone who might be able to change the way she feels! A love story develops between a not so normal girl and an equally not so normal boy!

(Source: Ichijinsha, translated)
